text:
Question 150) The water tank of a building will be shaped like a straight rectangle parallelepiped with a volume of 28 080 liters. In a model that represents the building, the water box has dimensions 2 cm × 3.51 cm × 4 cm.
Given: 1 dm³ = 1 L.
The scale used by the architect was
A) 1: 10
B) 1: 100
C) 1: 1 000
D) 1: 10 000
E) 1: 100 000
